OOC: I've got to say those Nanobots are very fast, cutting down the
whole thing in a matter of seconds.

BIC:

Megatron saw the base crumble, and screamed with rage. "SHOW NO MERCY"
He yelled, as he was preparing to make one last push. He jumped up and
fired at the ground where all the pieces were left. "Attack the CF with
all your force" he commanded the Decepticons as he then fired on it as
well.


Sinnertwin took this as a chance to fight some more. He transformed and
ran towards the closest robot, Cledar. He shot three streams of flames
at the robot.
